quest.name: Magiteknical Failure
journal: Captain Loezkirz has lost something very important.
objectives: Pilot the magitek armor to East End and destroy the Garlean drones.
Pilot the magitek armor to Velodyna River and destroy the Garlean drones.

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: [GC Rank] SurnameForename Surname of the Twin AddersForename Surname of the Immortal Flames. Just the womanman I wanted to see.

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: We've misplaced a number of Garlean drones taken from Baelsar's Wall. And by misplaced, I mean the damn things sprang to life and stormed out of the base. They need to be dealt with before any civilians come to harm.

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: Being familiar with magitek as you are, I can think of no one better to assist us. If you would be willing to help, go and speak with Lieutenant G'nibnpha. She is overseeing the initiative to terminate the drones.

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: Lieutenant G'nibnpha is well versed in magitek technology and should be able to answer any questions you have.

dialogue.name: GNIBNPHA
dialogue.text: [GC Rank]Ah, SurnameAh, Forename Surname! Your assistance is greatly appreciated. The drones were not in our possession for very long, but a cursory inspection showed they are made with a heretofore unknown metal alloy.

dialogue.name: GNIBNPHA
dialogue.text: They are all but impervious to traditional firearms, which is why we commissioned Garlond Ironworks to fashion a weapon capable of penetrating their armor.

dialogue.name: GNIBNPHA
dialogue.text: It has since been fitted to a suit of magitek armor, which I would ask you to pilot.

dialogue.name: GNIBNPHA
dialogue.text: If I am not mistaken, this would not be the first time you've piloted one of these suits. It should take you no time, then, to familiarize yourself with the controls.

dialogue.name: GNIBNPHA
dialogue.text: Now, the drones were last sighted due east of here and to the north along the Velodyna River. I fear recapturing them is out of the question, so do whatever you deem necessary to stop them.

dialogue.name: GNIBNPHA
dialogue.text: I doubt they've gone much further than the Velodyna River. Please hurry, before anyone comes to harm.

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: Welcome back. I take it the drones have been disposed of, then. Excellent work.

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: We were quite fortunate for your presence. Save for Lieutenant G'nibnpha, none of my men can even activate a suit of magitek armor, let alone pilot one in combat.

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: I only pray that isn't to our detriment in the future. There's still plenty more of those drones out there along Baelsar's Wall. If any more of them should suddenly stir...

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: At any rate, we will continue working with Garlond Ironworks so that should such a day come, we will be ready.

dialogue.name: GNIBNPHA
dialogue.text: The drones have been destroyed? Thank goodness. Captain Loezkirz will be glad to hear it.
